website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for tech-savy do-it-yourselfers for reading some basic codes on most vehicles 1996 and newer, but it has limitations and a learning curve.
pros: An updated model that utilizes iOS and Android devices to deliver information on "check engine" lights
cons: Basic – doesn't locate all issues, including airbag/ABS codes
Can be difficult to pair to your smart device

customer_reviews.title: Very easy, I have a Jeep and the port was ...
customer_reviews.text: So my engine light was on for a few days, and I made an appointment with my mechanic. I decided to get this to see if I could fix it myself. I got it the night before my appointment and it took me all of 5 minutes to download the app and plug it in. Very easy, I have a Jeep and the port was right under the dash. So it came up as a thermostat that was going bad. I kept my appointment with my mechanic because I knew I couldn't fix that myself, but I didn't say a word about what could be wrong. They diagnosed the same thing so now I know it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Melsie517

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, install and simple software but......
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the software and ran the diagnostic. Come to find out that this product only produces a report IF the check engine light is on. You can leave it on and it will produce a result only if the check engine light comes on during your trip. Unlike other OBD products it does not provide an active report of what is going on in the engine. Works well and easy to use software so I give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT work consistently.........variable, at best. I purchased it in August 2017 and it has never worked as advertised. Usually the FIXD cannot read the code or is unable to erase it. As a result, I purchased a unit used by dealers/auto shops and it has NEVER failed ! Spare yourself on FIXD !!!
customer_reviews.author: George Holder

customer_reviews.title: No go on 2002 Ford Mustang
customer_reviews.text: Never could get it work with my 2002 Ford Mustang, instructions are limited, ended up just driving it up to Autozone to have it scanned. Maybe will play with it some more when I have the free time but for now its just sitting in the glove box.........
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but since I don’t have any current problems with my car, I not sure if it works. I brought the product as a precaution because my car is 12 years old. I will say that it was easy to setup and I love your customer service. I had 1 question and within a matter of minutes you responded. Thanks for the great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Monica J Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. After dozens of attempts to connect it never connected. Contacted customer service and they basically resent the directions (like I couldn't read it from the package) and I sent back photos of the failed attempts and requested more advice and nothing. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Your ASE mechanic is much better.........
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not clear. The data was not consistent, and showed the operating temperature for the vehicle, the outside air but did not pinpoint the engine caution light problem. The monitor did recognize the caution but I already knew the light was on, I did not learn of the problem. It is a sound concept but only if it works as advertised. My vehicle is a 2014 BMW 328d, not an older car. This gadget should pick up fault codes fairly easily. I did not see anything about service reminders either. There should be a website to walk you thru the device.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Tried it on a 2001 GMC truck and it read the code and let us know what it meant. Also like the fact that it will read up to three vehicles and keep them stored.
customer_reviews.author: Markatrig

customer_reviews.title: The device did perform almost as advertised. It linked ...
customer_reviews.text: The device did perform almost as advertised. It linked up to the ap and did find why my check engine light was on. In addition it agreed with what my mechanic had told me on the last three trips there, however it would not turn off the light as it said that it would. I will give it another try later as I am convinced that I will keep it, it does the hard part of the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Frisse

customer_reviews.title: Found code issue immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for husband. Was able to immediately find code and issue. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: moejoe

customer_reviews.title: it feels like a one trick pony as I was left asking ...
customer_reviews.text: Work but needs improving, lots of it. My tire light was on and it didn’t pick that up on the scan. The devise lacks variety, i was under the impression it would be able to send you notifications and updates on services and issues as they arise but it doesn’t. After using it, it feels like a one trick pony as I was left asking myself, “is that all it does?”.To be fair, there was a section that stated more features will be added later so I am assuming they are going to charge me for that upgrade😔. The concept of this devise is brilliant though but not worth the asking price in its present form.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Have had the unit plugged in since receiving 2/13/18 checked app many times with no results. On 6/13/18 dashboard light showed (maint) checks FIXD indicated no maintenance needed. Therefore I don’t believe this works. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: larry E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Found one peculiarity. I need to periodically unplug it to get it to "wake" up. So, I turn the car off. Unplug it, wait twenty seconds, plug it back in, and start the car. It helped me find an elusive check engine light problem. It was the transmission temperature sensor. I definitely recommend the FIXD.
customer_reviews.author: John J Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, because it has always worked
customer_reviews.text: I worked one time. Connected and all, but then I hooked it up the next day to check something out, and nothing. It will not connect, blue light will not stay on. Will not connect. Has never been outside my vehicle or used on another vehicle. Very disappointed, because it has always worked.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Simple and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant in getting this as I thought there would be a catch. Like need to buy a special app. I had a code that just needed to be cleared and it did just that. I have nothing to say bad about it. It is connected to both cars and I could add more. Keeps a good record.
customer_reviews.author: rberto

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in Nov. 2017 put app on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Nov.2017 put app on phone and waited for car sensor light to come on that I had been having trouble with. It came on January 31, 2018. On Feb. 1 I used FIXD, followed instructions, it diagnosed problem and cleared code. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Hilkey

customer_reviews.title: It would be good if this could interact with and display on late ...
customer_reviews.text: It helps me pin point where trouble is, and lets me know if my local auto repair shop is being honest in their assessments. Worth it to be able to call up information. It would be good if this could interact with and display on late model cars with built in navigator and audio screens.
customer_reviews.author: hleejpn

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this thing is great and has helped out several times already. Only issue is it has a hard time connecting with the bluetooth and can take several tries to reconnect once it has already detected the initial errors, if you are trying to clear the codes. Still a very handy item to have
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great little device for assisting in the diagnosis of your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little device for assisting in the diagnosis of your vehicle. My engine check light came on, so I connected the FIXD and diagnosed the problem (Throttle Position Sensor). I did further research on-online on the part. I inform the mechanic on the code FIXD diagnosed. His equipment had the same diagnosis. I feel it is a great tool to keep mechanics honest. After leaving the Auto Shop I just pulled into driveway and the check engine light came on again. First thought that the mechanic did not complete repairs properly. I connected the FIXD it indicated another code so I followed FIXD instructions and the check engine light went off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However its nice to know the magnitude of the issue
customer_reviews.text: On time as promised. Doesnt clear engine light until problem is fixed...which in some cases will never happen. However its nice to know the magnitude of the issue. ( minor) I can live with it.... Along with you tube, got some ideas which may lead to resolutionof the issue. ( evap related check engine light issue not resolved by installing a new gas cap.....)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: 2011 Prius
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works on my 2011 Prius. And I’m able to track all my maintenance from within the app, oil changes are no longer guesses for me. And a plus is, my father plugged it into his Camry and it was able to pinpoint his code for him. What a sweet device!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah solomon

customer_reviews.title: Big Help for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for help with car problems since my father passed away. It took no time to plug it into her car and the app is very easy to understand. Looking forward to her having real-time, easy to understand feedback if something happens to her car. Very impressed with how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fixed
customer_reviews.text: I used it once but have not taken my car in to be fixed yet. It was easy to download the app and figure out how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Cates

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but returned it because I see no point ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but returned it because I see no point in having a device connected only to wait for a check engine light to come on. My light does not come on and when it does I can go to a local Auto Zone and get the codes from them or I can rebuy this product when and if the light turns on. As far as maintenance reminders while a good thing I am good at keeping up with oil changes, fluids etc. Only good for people who have a vehicle with a constant check engine light on IMO.
customer_reviews.author: tiburon

customer_reviews.title: ... no way to do that but overall it worked great
customer_reviews.text: It just tell me there was too many things wrong with my truck I didn’t know about I wish I could clear the check engine light though there’s no way to do that but overall it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is wrong with my car.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like that I have a full explanation of what is wrong with my car. I can be intelligent when talking to my mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Renee E. Yarbough-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought it
customer_reviews.text: Omg so easy to use and the app works great. Very easy to go from vehicle to vehicle. Already fixed problems with our work truck and jeep. Saved us lots of mechanics fees and down time. Liked that i didnt have to look for codes and the explanations were spot on and very understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent engine test
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 30 seconds. Download the app and diagnose and reset those engine lights. I move it from car to car. Diagnosed my engine misfire on 2 cylinders on my Traverse.
customer_reviews.author: Vision Ventures Video

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Wait
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the FIXD I was disappointed that it was delayed 2 extra days but when it showed I was impressed. I tried with my vehicle and had some trouble because I was not following the instructions correctly but after trying with my parents cars I got the hang of it. Currently I have three vehicles registered and it works. Very excited to see it in action when I get a check engine light or get a text notification for changing my oil.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Courtney Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my Lexus that keeps giving an engine light warning because it thinks the gas cap isn't tight enough. But it is. Note: if you are trying to clear a silly red engine light like this one before getting it smogged, you will need to drive at least 25 miles after clearing the engine light before getting it smogged. There has to be enough data for smog certification.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFeather

customer_reviews.title: this device quickly diagnosed my issue and the fixes are stupid easy. Ordered the sensors parts right off Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This thing paid for itself in less than five minutes after plugging it in. For almost half the cost of bringing my car to a costly repair shop for a computer diagnostic, this device quickly diagnosed my issue and the fixes are stupid easy. Ordered the sensors parts right off Amazon, quick 90 second video in Youtube (yes, it's that quick of a fix) and I will have saved hundreds in repair costs.
customer_reviews.author: T. PIKE

customer_reviews.title: Immediate diagnosis
customer_reviews.text: Today, immediately I plugged this product in our 99 jag XK8 when the check engine light came on and diagnosed a vacuum leak in a hose. I recommend this product to let you know the exact code of the problem. I will place one on all of my vehicles. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the FIXD monitors for my sons. They were installed in minutes and have been easy to set up and understand. They both own used vehicles no longer on warranty and are excited to know that it will be an important diagnostic tool to keeping their vehicles running smoothly, and saving money by not needing to pay to have the diagnostic done. My son said it best, “it’s like a Fitbit for my car!”
customer_reviews.author: beccawright

customer_reviews.title: FIXD for the family
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot, I convinced my friend and she got one for her daughter and grand daugthers.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Its that easy. Also
customer_reviews.text: Download the app to your phone, plug in the device, get your vehicle error codes explained. Its that easy. Also, you can know what causes the "Check Engine" light. Then reset it if the error is not bad. One of my three cars checked had the "Check Engine" light on for years and the error was due to my gas cap not being tight enough. I checked the cap and reset the code and now no light. I don't have anything negative to write.
customer_reviews.author: Blake J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: This item is great for someone that doesn't know about cars
customer_reviews.text: Tyrone Johnson, This item is great for someone that doesn't know about cars. It helps you to understand more of what your mechanic tells you about your cars problems. Before you carry in a sample that you may understand. Great. You worry less. Even gives you an eye on how much it could cost to have it fix.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with FIXD
customer_reviews.text: Check engine light was on. Plugged this gadget in and found that the thermostat needed to be replaced. Easy to use and gave a detailed description of what the thermostat controls. So far so good. Pleased with purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Great product and app for ANY car with an OBD-II sensor
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product and I've used it on both of my cars. The plug in monitor and app are super easy to set up and use. The app is terrific and gives you a full detailed report on any issues that may be occurring. There's also a handy feature where you can turn off the evil "check engine" light if the issue is not a true hazard. Again, full 5 stars on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Log

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. It gave me the answer as to why my service engine soon light came on. My number 8 cylinder misfired. But since my truck is running great no action was required.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Matthys

customer_reviews.title: It worked better than I expected on my 2007 Dodge Ram 1500
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than I expected on my 2007 Dodge Ram 1500. It read codes ,approximate repair costs, help finding parts, technical information. I just could not clear the codes with it. Other than that I would buy it again if I had too.
customer_reviews.author: jesse j martins

customer_reviews.title: Great product. After using the product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. After using the product, I was able pinpoint the exact issue related to my car's problem and advised my mechanic to fixed the exact problem accordingly. Had my O2 Sensor, Bank 2 and No. 2, replaced on my BMW X5, for less $160 part included. Great way to make sure they fixed the right problem for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shoo-shoo

customer_reviews.title: Heard about this unit on you tube. My wife ...
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this unit on you tube. My wife had to have one. She has a 2001 corvette with a check engine light that comes on and goes off. After downloading the app, she plugged the FIXD into the computer port and immediately the unit identified what type of car it was and what the error code was. Since she just had it in for a similar issue, we now know it was not fixed properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has worked out great so far
customer_reviews.text: It has worked out great so far! I was able to quickly diagnose my check engine light. Then, I knew exactly what the problem was, and I was able to research the cost. During my research I came across a service called my mechanic, and since I knew exactly what needed to be done I was able to order the services of a mechanic that came and fixed my car while it was in the parking lot of my job! It all worked out very conveniently!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Dooling

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and really self-explanatory for how much it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and really self-explanatory for how much it actually comes in handy. Really really happy with this purchase and I'm happy that I can pretty much not have to worry about the problems in my car anymore.
customer_reviews.author: mpAtl03

customer_reviews.title: Does a pretty decent job
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty decent job. Could be more detailed on some odd the odd codes that arnt to common. But this beats paying a shop $70 to do the exact same thing this can do.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I did have a light and it did tell me the issue, but I've only had it a couple of days so havent verified its accuracy yet. Installation was a breeze and I'm certainly not good in that arena so no fears there.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Came on time. No problem syncing it to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. No problem syncing it to the phone. Minor problem and I was able to clear it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again. Doesn’t provide much info ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase again. Doesn’t provide much info about the car problem so still ended up taking it to the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Smith

customer_reviews.title: wow love it.
customer_reviews.text: Hey it is so awesme and it helped us to find what wrong and simple... wow love it .. thank you for your business....
customer_reviews.author: SONIA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Give women power!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a gift for my friend. She had her son set it up for her and now she can drive to Florida and back knowing any trouble she has with the car will be accessible to her. From women everywhere, Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: susan beauchesne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised - first time out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: You need to have strong cell phone reception.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my old 2004 Dodge Ram. Only problem I had was due to my location. I live in a remote area in HI & phone signal is weak. Resolved the problem by driving into urban area with more towers & it worked fine. Good to know what repairs are actually needed before taking it into a shop for repairs. Unfortunately it pays to check on car repaiman...... some are great guys & others not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Fixed worked it told us one of our one cylinder was not firing. It doesn't give the reason but it was correct a mouse ate the wires the bit back and shocked the mouse. Very pleased with fixd
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself the first time I used it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself the first time I used it. Saved me a trip to the dealer and turned off the engine warning light.
customer_reviews.author: rcdancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Family!
customer_reviews.text: My little sister just got her first car and this has been the perfect gift to help her learn about car maintenance. Now I have peace of mind to know she can identify any issues before bringing her car to the mechanic!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use! Great Results!
customer_reviews.text: From a woman’s point of view, this is awesome! Get the app on your phone, plug FIXD into your vehicle and follow directions on the app on your phone... No Brainer! Now you can go to a mechanic & be confident that you know what is wrong with your vehicle, just tell them what you need fixed! Takes away that worry of “Am I being taken advantage of?”. Great gift for everyone, especially women!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, will get your money back after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product just wish it could diagnose more than just engine light but still very useful it tell you when the mai ten runs schedule for your vehicle and is very easy to plug in
customer_reviews.author: zoes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use shows any problem with your vehicle very very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little item
customer_reviews.text: Great little item, shows what you need when you need it. Have really not got into it yet because insurance has a snapshot device installed on truck.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably simple and easy to use. Beats the old device that gives you codes no one can understand. No more worrying about the check engine light. Just a notice that I may not be able to pass emissions test.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Croy

customer_reviews.title: Great little sensor very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great little sensor very versatile, reads any issue that I've had and helps me to provide a quick fix myself for all of the issues I've had with the car so far.
customer_reviews.author: Emil Muly

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: Even though I'm a pretty tech savvy I appreciated how user friendly and easy to understand the user interface was. It also didn't take too long to set up. So far it was been perfect helping with the error messages and made my life a lot easier.r
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWARENESS IS KNOWLEDGE
customer_reviews.text: FIXD REALLY WORKS AND IS EVERYTHING IT SAYS IT IS. CHECK YOUTUBE REVIEWS. KNOW WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOUR CAR BEFORE SPENDING HUNDREDS OR THOUSANDS FOR REPAIRS.
customer_reviews.author: al tilley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS SAVED ME $200.00 OUT THE GATE BY SHOWING ME THE PROBLEM
customer_reviews.author: Dorsey McThrow Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works as described. The FIXD was easy to set up and started working right away. I would highly recommend if you are having car problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very simple instructions and we love it.
customer_reviews.text: Installed the monitor in the car and on the iPhone. Worked perfectly with no difficulties. Very simple instructions and we love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great all you had to do was a few simples steps and it tells you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test myself before getting one for my Daughter. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: ... I have two in two cars now it works great would recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is my third FIXD I have two in two cars now it works great would recommend this product to everyone. Easy to use app explains everything you need to know to either fix yourself, or have the knowledge to bring it to a repair shop and not get the run around. I will purchase a third one soon for a third car in the family. I had left one in a car that I sold to a junk yard and was able to get it back before it was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Simple to use. Picked up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Simple to use. Picked up error code U0140 but could not describe problem gave message contact support for information.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It was beyond easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was beyond easy to use! I'm very impressed with the product and would highly recommend it for someone who is nervous about the truthfulness of repair shops. At least when you go, you are armed with information and can guide the mechanic to the issue. I'm happy I purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: awhitcraft

customer_reviews.title: FIXD
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and I am hopeful this will help me down the road in case something goes wrong with my Honda. Thanks for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great device! Simple installation, Straightforward app. I will never be scammed by dishonest mechanics again.
customer_reviews.author: dparro

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and does exactly what it was designed to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and does exactly what it was designed to do. It took less than 5 minutes to download the application to my mobile device, pair the device, run diags and clear the check engine light. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a quick diagnostics tool at a great price. The application also allows you to track non-electronic information.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, downloaded the app, synced it, and cleared my light. It even gives you a 'map' of what the engine was doing when it throws the light.
customer_reviews.author: Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Very good item to have.
customer_reviews.text: Very good item. Recommend that you get a second generation one though. Just in case it mulfuctions, fb messenger is good for faster responses. I think it also helps to include a warrant in your purchase price.......I think it helped in my case.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: FIXD is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love FIXD! I hated having to drive to a auto store just to find out why my engine light is on and now with FIXD I have it right at my fingertips! I even did a comparison with the auto store and FIXD, FIXD actually gave me a better description of what was wrong than the auto store! I would recommend it to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: This little thing right here is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you!! This little thing right here is the best!!! it works just like how everyone says!!! I am taking my car to the shop to let them know what to fix specifically lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Dejax

customer_reviews.title: Finally an easy to use and affordable option to know what's wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally an easy to use and affordable option to know what's wrong with my car!! I actually trust this product because it helps me understand the details of my car's issues before I take it to the shop so I know if the mechanic is trying to rip me off or not. Also, their website was very helpful when I was installing the device!
customer_reviews.author: Linda He

customer_reviews.title: Diagnostics you can understand.
customer_reviews.text: This product us so easy to use and so helpful. I was planning to put my truck in the shop for a repair quoted at $1,120.00. After using this for diagnostics I watched a utube and did the repair myself for $86.00.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: My son's 2003 car engine light came on which prompted me to buy this quicker than I was going to (Christmas). I'd seen the ads around but you just never know with this type of thing. He installed it, downloaded the app and it told him what was wrong. He's going to school to become a mechanic, so he changed it himself after watching a few YouTube videos on how to do it. It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to operate, fast accurate results. Great little item no mechanic should be without for quickie diagnostics.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: but it worked great and told me my problem and then asked if ...
customer_reviews.text: Not being tect savey, it took me a few times to get it right, but it worked great and told me my problem and then asked if I wanted to reset the check engine light.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn snyder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to upload the app
customer_reviews.text: Easy to upload the app, easy to follow the instructions! Hardest part was finding the OBD-11 location on my car! Just Googled it and found the correct link that made it easy!
customer_reviews.author: PBROOK83

customer_reviews.title: FIXD
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully for my peace of mind; it showed no error messages. It gives detailed list of what maintenance is needed at specified mileages. Happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: This is so neat and incredibly accurate. Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: FIXD is a great little asset for the car
customer_reviews.text: I received the FIXD yesterday, downloaded the app, plugged it into my Chevy Cruze, registered it, and the info came up on my cell phone. It was that easy. Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Grace

customer_reviews.title: I love this scanner works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner works great and easy to use. I have 5 scanners and this is my favorite. A must buy if you are in the car business.
customer_reviews.author: Superjay

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The video link in the follow-up e-mail from Fixd was especially helpful. Have just installed, only took a few minutes and done.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: This device paid for itself the first time I used it. Love, love, love it
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works fantastically in coordination with the phone app! As someone that doesn't know much about cars, this sensor has helped me identify problems before they have become issue and has allowed me to be more helpful when heading to the mechanic! It is clear the team takes customer service seriously as I have reached out to them with an issue and they responded same day!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: So far I have had issues with my cars showing ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had issues with my cars showing a " Check Engine Light" twice within a few months. They gave me what the issue is so I can fix it or it may direct me to take it to a mechanic....Either way, it tells me what the issue is.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome !!! Had check engine light on and I ended up it was an error code for "low coolant temp - may not pass emissions" It was just inspected and emissions tested about 20 days ago , and passed with flying colors ! Thankfully , I could turn the light off without going to the mechanic 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: jamzee@bellatlantic.net

customer_reviews.title: App update fixed my FIXD 'trouble synching' issue
customer_reviews.text: I received my FIXD sensor a few days ago. I was having a difficult time connecting to the sensor in 2 of my cars but was easily able to connect in another. I was getting a bit frustrated and reached out to FIDX support via email. They were very responsive but none of the suggestions they offered were all obvious and didn't seem to help. I sent another email to them today and received an email back stating that there was an update on 2/13/18. I downloaded the update and it fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and as advertised. I'd recommend to friends to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Channaravina Sin

customer_reviews.title: A must have in every family!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband, he's already diagnosed all the cars in our family! I'd say this is a win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have purchased 2 of these units and they work great. Cleared the CEL so I could gather information ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these units and they work great. Cleared the CEL so I could gather information when the light would come back on. Auto parts stores would read the code but not clear them, so if I fixed one problem, the code was still there.
customer_reviews.author: mike r perman

customer_reviews.title: Every car owner should have one
customer_reviews.text: How easy it is to set up for your car. Told me exactly what was wrong with my car. Was able to fix the problem myself
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Told me why my light was on and able to turn it off easy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Told me why my light was on and able to turn it off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Diehl

product_meta.title: FIXD OBD2 Professional Bluetooth Scan Tool & Code Reader for iPhone and Android
feature_bullets: Powerful Check Engine Light Diagnostics — Read and diagnose your check engine light, understand the severity of the issue, and clear that pesky light from your vehicle. FIXD translates your vehicle into simple English, empowering you to make the easy fix in many cases & saving you precious time. FIXD also saves you money by providing you with estimated repair costs up-front, allowing you to feel more confident during those trips to the mechanic

The Trusted Choice — FIXD is the professional choice proudly designed in the USA by Professional Engineers and ASE Certified Mechanics. Get unlimited access to over 10,000 manufacturer specific and enhanced trouble codes (ABS, Airbag, TPMS, and Transmission*). With the App, you’ll have freeze frame data, live diagnostic data, and proactive vehicle maintenance reminders at your fingertips. All the capabilities of an expensive Scan Tool at a fraction of the cost

Easy & Intuitive — The powerful FIXD OBD-II Diagnostic Sensor and the professionally designed FIXD App are the perfect pair. The FIXD Code Reader is light & compact, remaining out-of-sight during your drive. The FIXD Sensor connects to the FIXD App via Bluetooth in seconds, providing you with a suite of resources easy enough for anyone to use

We've Got You Covered — The FIXD OBD 2 Scan Tool is compatible with all gas-powered vehicles made after 1996 (no all-electric or diesel) and works with all vehicle protocols. Works with iPhone, iPad, and Android devices

Go further with FIXD Premium— Upgrade your in-app experience with: Cost and repair estimates from the Identifix database, Unlimited calls to our FIXD Mechanic Hotline for a trusted second opinion and DIY help from our network of ASE certified mechanics, And much more! FIXD Premium is a monthly subscription that is optional and is not required for use of the sensor

specifications.Special Features: Live Data: Display multiple PIDs as a graph, gauge, or chart. Other available displays include fighter jet, trip, and 0 to 60 mode, Diagnostic Reports: Code Definition, simplified explanation with additional resources for repairs, Freeze Frame: Vehicle snapshot when a code is stored, Timeline: Get access to manufacturer specific service intervals, Read Enhanced Codes: e.g. ABS, Airbag, Transmission, TPMS, etc for Ford, Chrysler, Toyota, Nissan, and Honda
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars6,548 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
